Warm weather clothing provided by Australian Antarctic Division for trip to Antarctica on 13 Dec 2012 (the AAD invited MPs and Senators on the trip to keep certain items of warm weather clothing that they do not reuse, and which would otherwise have been discarded). I expect their combined value did not exceed the disclosure threshold, but have disclosed it to be cautious.

Commonwealth Treasury Bond certificate (unsure whether replica or original) from 1987 for the value of $20. I expect their combined value did not exceed the disclosure threshold, but have disclosed it to be cautious.
